content: with this pattern you will be able to make as many baby whales as you want this is the perfect project for advanced beginner crocheters you will receive one pdf english - us terminology difficulty beginner skills required crocheting in spiral magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet stitch increasing and decreasing materials 2 colors of #6 bulky yarn weight you can use any yarn for this project suggested yarns parfait chunky honey bunny baby snuggle himalayan dolphin paintbox chenille etc 4mm crochet hook 10mm safety eyes polyester fiberfill for stuffing yarn needle scissors stitch markers copyright © 2023 content of this document may not be copied reproduced altered published or distributed in any way you may sell finished products made with this pattern provided credit to all from jade
